resources.string:
The rule of the game is very simple. 
 You need to connect all the platines together. 
 The line between platines is seen as the capacity of both platines. 
 Each platine need to have as many lines going in as the capacity showed next to the platine 
 You are not allowed to connect 2 platines when another platine is located in between or a loading line in other direction is already there 
 There are maximal 2 loading lines going to a platine

I offer you a small GUI to test the game. 
 I don't support land mode here. Mean don't rotate your application while playing 
 Choose a level from the top down panel and click load button to load the game 
 If the table of game is too small or too big for you, use plus or minus sign in the toolbar to resize the table of game 
 Resize button will automatically load a game again with new size. So be sure to scale your table of game before playing 
 Click on the platine to choose. 2 chosen platines to be applied rule will be marked white. The others are blue 
 You can use connect button to connect between 2 chosen platines 
 You can use remove button to remove your current loading lines. Each time you can only remove 1 linear. 
 You can test your result any time you want by check button 
 Remember if the result is right. I will block the gui for that level. Because I take in consideration that you want to go to next level 
 If you stuck. Check out the Instruction & Solution in toolbar for more information and available solution 
 Any button in Instruction & Solution page is able to close by click again after opening
\n Please choose a level and click load button \n Resize your table of game if necessary
Please choose 2 platines to remove loading
This application is built for the IT talent competition 2017. \nTopic: simulate the old japanese mystery by designing a game of building platine \nAuthor: L3I2
